articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Volkanovski beats Lopes; reclaims UFC featherweight title in front of Trump - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The Australian beat his Brazilian opponent by unanimous decision to reclaim his title on UFC 314 fight night in Miami.
articles.content: Alexander Volkanovski has reclaimed the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) featherweight championship after defeating Diego Lopes by unanimous decision at UFC 314 in Miami, where United States Pres… [+3554 chars]
